text.content: AIMS
AIMS can help you if you're having a hard time with irritability or anger.
Tap the message icon below to share information about these apps with others.
CBT-i Coach
Although this app is designed for use with a healthcare professional, it can be helpful for learning more about getting better sleep.
Tap the message icon below to share information about these apps with others.
Mindfulness Coach
Mindfulness Coach provides exercises and information that can help to:

content: Focus awareness on the present moment and
Take power away from unwanted thoughts or memories.

text.content: Tap the message icon below to share information about these apps with others.
Stay Quit Coach
Do you smoke cigarettes and want to quit?
Create a personal plan, set a quit date, and start your life as a non-smoker.
Tap the message icon below to share information about these apps with others.
Breathe2Relax
Deep breathing is one of the best ways to learn to relax.
Learn to take controlled, deeper breaths using this free, customizable app.
Tap the message icon below to share information about these apps with others.
Mood Tracker
Track your mood, or other things that are important to you, using Mood Tracker.

PTSD Coach
You may want to share this app if you think someone else might benefit from the information and tools you have seen here.
